casebody.data:
No. 09-1400. The Laborers District Council Construction Industry Pension Fund, et al., Petitioners v. Omnicare, Inc., et al. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 380,

178 L. Ed. 2d 15,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6448. October 4, 2010.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to a file brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

*16Same case below, 583 F.3d 935.
